Text: Thx. I had this album on vinyl years ago, and can't wait to hear it again :-)
You're welcome. I still enjoy this album a lot, probably due to the production being more than decent. Side 2 (as it used to be) is much rockier and builds to a great crescendo...Nice.
I just uploaded Mark Free's post Kobra band, Signal at http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6591223/Signal_-_Loud__amp__Clear_%28320kbps%29
